storyInfo: Now back home, Siege discovers the rift that's formed between her and her good friends of old. Rhodes Island and the Glasgow Gang decide to save Norport Borough. The Damazti Cluster leads Golding to sink fully into her own despair.

attributes.content: This room...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Take a look, Dagda, this is our old home!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Oooh!
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Must've been pretty good, living here!
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: No shit it was!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Hannah never did the cleaning, though.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Oi, Vina! How many more times do you want me to fess up to my mistakes?!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: I dropped in now and then after you left, tidied things a little. Been a few years, but shouldn't be much different than it was?
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: My whole stash is still here! Always knew you were tight, Baird!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: *sigh* Fancy me having to be the poor girl left behind.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Don't give me that, Baird. You told us you were going to stay!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: How you need to be in your own bed, be shambling the moment you were out of Norport!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Yeah, well, maybe I should've tried and put up with it.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Stuff that! You think I don't know you? We're all stuck in hell when you can't sleep!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: If I'm tired enough to go six feet under, the last thing I want is you trying to chinwag with me again!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Hahah, well, I've been falling asleep just about anywhere these days.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: What, too tired?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Might be.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Just, found out sleeping's the... best way to empty your head.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: ...Once my Rhodes Island mission's done, Baird, I'll bring you lot out of here.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: All of you.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Here, here, here, let's pop some bottles to celebrate getting back together after all these years!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: It's cheap stuff, but hey, maybe leaving it so long made it better?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Morgan, give Baird a read of those books you wrote! Tell her about our adventures!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Hey, Baird, you're missing your chance to become part of the King's chronicles—
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: ...Morgan? What's wrong? You've been pale as a sheet this whole time.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: We finally made it home! You ought to chin up a little.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: I'm thinking about... the... hand I stepped on.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: It was probably just some accident.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: It had a thumb ring on it. Something's telling me I've seen it somewhere before.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: I feel like I should remember...
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: But I just keep drawing a blank.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: I... Baird, what's been happening in Norport all these days?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Not much, Morgan. Maybe it was just an accident.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Everyone's been trying their hardest to survive, that's all.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: It's in the past, anyway. You're back now. We'll be out of here soon. That's enough for us.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Norport's our home.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: I used to picture what it'd be like when we came back. I thought we'd spend our first night piling into that snooker place to play until the sun came up, then go drinking next door until it all went dark.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Or maybe we'd go to McClaren at the video place and reserve all the seats, end up watching ten whole adventure movies back to back.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: I saw it. But I didn't dare look properly.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: All that broken glass caked with the blood, and the... shadows all on the ground inside.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: You should get a proper kip. Like me.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Must be shattered after coming all this way.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Vina, you've got that Realmblade now. You'll be the hero, yeah?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: You'll save Norport. We'll save Norport.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: This'll all just pass, right?!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: We'll take back our old lives.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Maybe if...
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Nah. Look how late it is. Get some rest, muckers.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: We've got mountains to deal with tomorrow.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Baird's right, Morgan. We all need to... get some proper rest.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Siege huddles up on the sofa. She used to spend countless nights here. Every inch of it feels as familiar as ever.
She still remembers how they picked up this couch at the flea market all those years ago, the four of them breaking their backs to carry the bloody piece of tat all the way to the gym's upstairs.
She reckoned it pretty wide back then, but soon enough she was resting her feet on the armrest just to fit.
In the dark, Siege's hand brushes over the sofa, feeling each nook and cranny.
Here's the gash left from when Hannah was practicing with her knife. Three whole days she felt guilty about that.

Morgan spilled a whole bottle of drink here. She bought a tin of awful cleaning stuff to treat the stain and it got worse the more she tried. The whole patch is still smooth as a baby's bottom to this day.
Baird put the iron down here and forgot about it. Nearly burned the whole room down.
She used to believe these days would never change.
She used to be sure these days would never change.
This is their Glasgow Gang. Their neighborhood. Their stomping grounds. Their home.
It's true, she's back.
But deep inside, she's not one bit happy.
That 'memoir' of Morgan's crosses her mind again. The Legendary Vina and Her Legendary Mates.
Siege gently touches the Sighs of Kings, resting by her side.
As ice-cold as it ever was.
Leader. Hero. King.
King of the Siege, Vina.
Alexandrina Vina Victoria.
Something on your mind, Vina?
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: These clothes are too heavy. I can't catch my breath sleeping in them.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I'm looking for stuff that fits me better.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: In that drawer.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: *huff*—
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Haven't gotten any taller, mm?
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Come on, we're adults. We stopped growing ages ago.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: You never know with these things. I remember when we first met, you were only about this tall...
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Enough, enough. It's the same old guff you always spout about time passing.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I haven't had anyone in years to tell that same old guff to.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: I'm sorry, Baird.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I'm just glad you're back, Your Majesty Vina.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Don't call me that.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: King of the Siege, same as ever, then.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: What is it, Lady Ermengarde?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Soldier

attributes.content: Don't call me Lady. I'm not that old yet.
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: I'm sorry... um, Miss Ermengarde? I'm not quite sure how old you liches are...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Soldier

attributes.content: *sigh* Forget it. Lady Ermengarde will do.
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: This high-speed battleship really has been reduced to tatters. Grr. And the Vampire's cohort gave this place a bathing too.
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: General Manfred says this is going to be the start of the Sarkaz's victory.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Soldier

attributes.content: Hrmph. The Sarkaz's victory.
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: *sigh* And old Dame Kal'tsit kept warning me a future like this wouldn't bring anything about for us.
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: Still, I just can't figure it out. Why would my tutor have had a Feline friend for so long?
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: We're leaving. I hate the stench of this place.
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: Come with me, please. Her Highness Theresa is waiting for you.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Soldier

attributes.content: Doctor, good morning.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We need to make some plans... for our upcoming operation.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The Sarkaz are treating the citizens as insurance that they won't be directly artillery-struck, but whether the Military Commission or the dukes, we can't truly count on their benevolence in this.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And even if we ignore the game that's ongoing between them, we're still bearing witness to the terrible state the blockade zone is in.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You've seen the state of chaos Norport is in these days. Far easier said than done to change the status quo.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: That medicine and stuff you brought with... I gave it a count. Afraid it's only a drop in the bucket.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Right, what you can accomplish is going to be very limited with our help alone. But that's no reason for us to hold back.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Investigation of the airship and evacuation plans for the plate's citizens are simultaneous work for us. We can't afford to overlook anything.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Um...
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: What's the matter, Miss Delphine?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You lot have the chops, right? You wriggled through the Sarkaz blockade to get here, so I'm guessing it's as easy for you to slip back out.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: I can say with pride that those gathered here now are all extraordinary operators of Rhodes Island, but I'm very sorry, Miss Delphine... I think we may not live up to what you're imagining.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: When pitted against those steering the war from behind the scenes, we may very well be called puny.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: So... you only got here thanks to some help?
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Unfortunately, it's a 'deal' as the man loved to put it, and not a fantastic one at that.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Are you... a Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Didn't think a duke would've found another Sarkaz lot to work with instead...
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Hmph. Someone thinks too much.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: No, I just read the papers usually.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Very good habit.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: You're still planning the evac right now, aren't you? Did your fancy-pants backer agree to help?
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Sadly for you, no. All signs say she doesn't care.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: But you lot obviously do.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Hah. Welcome to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: I'm keeping my opinions to myself, though. My concern is whether we can get out of here alive.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Then I've a proposal. Rhodes Islanders, this may be a bit of a risk...
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: The Sarkaz have locked down every information channel out of Norport, and I think I can guess what their excuse to the wider public is.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: And see, I trust any of the dukes to know it is nothing more than an excuse.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: But they won't spoil the facade themselves. In fact, the dukes and the Military Commission of Kazdel have a quiet understanding on that.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Yes, the Sarkaz are using this plate's people as an excuse. Aren't the dukes? My guess is if the Sarkaz did slaughter every last soul here, a few dukes would be breathing a sigh of relief.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: In a war, some only see ethics as a burden.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Yeah, you're not wrong.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: So we... go and break that silent understanding.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: We need to give some of the dukes a push. Make them act more decisively.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Before we're all dead here for real.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Days it's been, Golding, and still not a word from you.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: You're not this reticent a person, as far as we know.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: How are the Londinium Citizens' Self-Salvation Corps?
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: They've left the city.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: How many of them are left?
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Not many, I wager.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: Fine, back to your silence. Does it bring you any peace?
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: I'm simply... remembering them. Remembering them all.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Enough, enough, Golding. You don't belong to them by nature, and you're free in any case to forget that insubstantial sense of affiliation.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: It wasn't your hands that killed them. Most simply do just die in war. You even came up with a word for it—'sacrifice.'
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: And most of those names, the people hiding behind them, you've never so much as met.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: Does becoming a member of a collective instill joy or pride in you?
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: Regretfully, as you've seen, we can only belong to ourselves in the end.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: No. I used to believe that...
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: At first, I believed I fought for our shared dream, for the Self-Salvation Corps' cause.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: In these past days, I've realized that might not have been the case.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Lettou was right. We are all the same kind.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: I told him he was pessimistic... yet look at me. Whether I admit it or not... I'm someone who despairs easily myself.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: The Corps' members may fight with pure ideals in heart, but the Corps itself does not.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Take Clovisia, or Allerdale... both women I respect for their character, yet their aims extend far beyond what they claim out loud.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: For a very long time, I pretended to be blind to that.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: It disillusions you now. You finally realize your undertakings were marred since the start.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: You feel your efforts were all in vain.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: Hardly.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: You see, I don't have any cause on my mind. I'm just thinking of the people. Faces upon faces.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Heidi, Feist, Rockrock, old Bill, Adams, little George...
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: I have no standing, and no right to say I should repent for the Self-Salvation Corps. I don't belong to any illusory collectives of that sort.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: But I need... to come face-to-face with every one of them, inside myself.
attributes.name: Golding
